comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: I did some armchair investigation recently to find out exactly where in Moruya the quarry was. Google Maps Satellite - g.co/maps/fp73g . With Street View it looks disused, as does the wharf - g.co/maps/f4mbw .

comment.author: 53132056@N00
comment._content: Very interesting link, thank you. The quarry has become a nice pool.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/gumtau] I think the pool would be full of mosquitoes and leeches! More about the history of the place - www.heritage.nsw.gov.au/07_subnav_01_2.cfm?itemid=1550153
